npmToken.description: NPM_TOKEN used to publish package. Fallbacks to NPM_TOKEN in env.

npmRegistry.description: The base URL of the npm package registry.

dryRun.description: Whether to actually publish or not.

tag.description: Tag for this package release. Fallbacks to NPM_PACKAGE_TAG in env then to latest.

caretDepsVersion.description: Whether to add ^ to deps version.
